reviews.text:
My wife and I were traveling in Sarajevo and we happened to stumble across this place.

We were looking to have breakfast before we start our day.  I must say, this place is excellent.  The food was authentic and the ambience was super.  Best part was that this place is halal ðŸ’¯- kudos to the owner brother Izmir for keeping this place halal.

Weâ€™ll definitely be back when weâ€™re in Sarajevo next time round.

We were there on breakfast. Really lovely place with nice interior. Tradicional Bosnian breakfast. I have meat with egg and fresh baked white bread, my wife had omelete with ham. Really good taste, great coffee.

Delicious food, absolutely worth the price, perfect portion size. Desert was fantastic and light, great for summer evening. Fast service, we got our food very quickly. Lovely staff, the waiter was so nice and funny, recommended us deserts and made sure we were happy with everything. Will definitely come back!!

Disclaimer 2: This restaurant has shut down due to low business and sales in it's area.

Disclaimer: The photos I've uploaded are from the site of the restaurant.

This restaurant is quick but the food isn't all that "amazing". It's good! Don't get me wrong, but nothing too amazing.

The restaurant itself is not too expensive but the waiters are polite and there's plenty off peeps at all times here.

The delivery time is approx. 15-30 minutes for car delivery but in the restaurant it's about 20 minutes.

The ambient is relaxing and there's no alchoholic drinks derved here.

If you need a quick bite or to go somewhere for a group lunch or dinner then this is the place for you!

The interior is really nice, with ac and the food is awesome and cheap. The waiters are polite and willing to help you with the order and by explaining the menÃ¹ and the Bosnian dishes. I really suggest you to give it a try
